member.name: P:OpenPath.Standard.Api.V1.Controllers.BaseContoller.LoggerFactory
member.summary: Represents a type used to configure the logging system and create instances of Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger from the registered Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerProviders.

member.name: P:OpenPath.Standard.Api.V1.Controllers.BaseContoller.Logger
member.summary: A generic interface for logging where the category name is derived from the specified TCategoryName type name. Generally used to enable activation of a named Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger from dependency injection.

member.name: M:OpenPath.Standard.Api.V1.Controllers.PlanetsController.PostAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{OpenPath.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel})
member.summary: Accepts an array of new or updated planets and either creates or updates them. This endpoint can handle a mixture of both.
member.returns: Returns an evelope with the updated and/or created planets in the data.
member.response: Returned if all planets were successfully updated.
Returned if all planets were successfully created.
Returned if all planets were successfully updated and created.
Returned if none of the planet references were found.
Returned if there was an issue creating or updating 1 or more planets.
Returned if there is an error within the API.

member.name: M:OpenPath.Standard.Api.V1.Controllers.PlanetsController.Get(OpenPath.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.PlanetFilterPoco)
member.summary: Gets a filtered array of Planets.
member.returns: Returns an evelope with filtered planets in the data.

member.name: M:OpenPath.Standard.Api.V1.Controllers.PlanetsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a single Planet by Planet ID or Planet Key.
member.returns: A an Envelope with Planet data.

member.name: M:OpenPath.Standard.Api.V1.Controllers.PlanetsController.DeleteAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a single Planet by Planet ID or Planet Key.
